attributes.action: Force the tobacco industry to lower the price of a pack of 17 cigarettes.
attributes.background: The tobacco industry have slowly reduced the amount of cigarettes in it's traditional pack of 20 to just 17. This has been done without a fair reduction in the price or any attempt to inform the public of the reduction.

rejection.details: This is a decision for cigarette manufacturers and retailers. If you would like a change in the way that tobacco products are taxed, you could start a petition calling for that.
